ai-patthana8.54:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.54:1.1_0: Not corruption, nor is for the corruption of defiled principles, nor because of the corruption of the defilements. ...
ai-patthana8.54:2.1_0: It’s not due to corruption, or corruption, or mental corruptions. Their cause and robes don’t give rise to the defilements.
ai-patthana8.54:3.1_0: Not corrupted or defiled, nor does the corruption of defilement, or with the defilements contemptuously, or with the defilements that give rise to defilements. ...
ai-patthana8.54:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
